news.title: Why police released details about Liverpool crash suspect so quickly
news.summary: The decision shows lessons have been learned from the Southport attacks last summer, writes Daniel Sandford.

news.title: Ministers considering scrapping two-child benefit cap
news.summary: The education secretary says the policy pushes people into poverty but warns scrapping it would be costly.

news.title: Controversial US-backed group says it has begun aid distribution in Gaza
news.summary: The Gaza Humanitarian Foundation says Palestinians have collected supplies, though the scale is unclear.

news.title: Leaked recording reveals police doubts over woman’s abortion arrest
news.summary: Police “not comfortable” operating in abortion criminalisation, says Met officer in case of Nicola Packer.

news.title: Mary Earps announces shock England retirement before Euro 2025
news.summary: England goalkeeper Mary Earps announces her retirement from international football with immediate effect - just five weeks before Euro 2025 begins.

news.title: IMF raises UK growth forecast as it warns on tax and spending
news.summary: In its annual health-check for the UK economy, the IMF predicted growth of 1.2%, a marginal upgrade to its previous forecast.

news.title: Man charged with attempted murder after police officer injured in Buckinghamshire
news.summary: Simranjit Kajla is charged with attempted murder after the suspected hit-and-run.

news.title: KFC to create 7,000 jobs in UK and Irish growth push
news.summary: The fried chicken firm will invest nearly £1.5bn over five years as rivals step up expansion.

news.title: King to give key speech in support of Canada after its dispute with Trump
news.summary: King Charles has received a warm welcome in Canada ahead of a historic speech to its parliament.

news.title: Tommy Robinson released after seven months in jail
news.summary: The 42-year-old, whose real name is Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, is freed after his sentence was reduced.
